column3: 11:06 And ... oh. The ironing. What am I going to do about that?

Despite the remaking of the BookWorld, some books remained tantalisingly out of reach [...] It was entirely possible that they didn't know there was a BookWorld, and still they thought they were real. A fantastic notion, until you consider that up until 11.06 am on 12 April 1948, everyone else had thought the same.
